DOC.brief_summary: A Phase II Study of CODOX-M/ IVAC in Relapsed/Refractory ALL
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study of CODOX-M/ IVAC in Relapsed/Refractory ALL
DOC.detailed_description: The feasibility will be evaluated in terms of complete remission rate, duration of complete remission, disease-free survival, overall survival, and toxicities.
DOC.criteria: Patients with relapsed/resistant acute lymphoblastic leukemia Patients must be between 15 and 65 years of age. Estimated life expectancy of more than 3 months ECOG performance status of 2 or lower, Karnofsky scale > 60 (see appendix I) Adequate cardiac function (EF>45%) on echocardiogram or MUGA scan Adequate kidney function (estimated Ccr >50 ml/min) Patients with CNS involvement of leukemic blasts will not be excluded. Patients with extramedullary relapse(s) only will be excluded.
